      • BeliefGoalPlan

        public BeliefGoalPlan(java.lang.String beliefName,
                      java.lang.Class<? extends BeliefGoalPlanBody> planBodyClass)
        Constructs a new Plan. It sets the plan library and plan body class of this plan, and initializes the goals that it can achieve and messages it can process. The goals are initialized with the provided goal class.
        Parameters:
        id - plan identifier
        goalClass - the goal that this plan can achieve

      • BeliefGoalPlan

        public BeliefGoalPlan(java.lang.String id,
                      java.lang.String beliefName,
                      java.lang.Class<? extends BeliefGoalPlanBody> planBodyClass)
        Constructs a new Plan. It sets the plan library and plan body class of this plan, and initializes the goals that it can achieve and messages it can process. The goals are initialized with the provided goal class.
        Parameters:
        id - plan identifier
        goalClass - the goal that this plan can achieve

    • Method Detail

      • canAchieve

        public boolean canAchieve(Goal goal)
        Verifies if a given goal can be achieved by this plan. When the goal is a MessageGoal, it invokes the method AbstractPlan.canProcess(ACLMessage). Otherwise, it checks if the class of this goal is contained in the goal set of this plan.
        Specified by:
        canAchieve in interface Plan
        Overrides:
        canAchieve in class AbstractPlan
        Parameters:
        goal - the goal to be verified.
        Returns:
        true if the given goal can be achieved by this plan, false otherwise.

      • checkBeliefGoal

        protected boolean checkBeliefGoal(BeliefGoal beliefGoal)
